title: Find Images for a Blog Post
description: A content manager needs to find 2-3 licensed stock photos to include in a new blog post.

tasks.description: Identify the main theme and keywords of the blog post.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the visual style needed.

tasks.description: Search a stock photography website for relevant images using the identified keywords.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of potential images.

tasks.description: Select and download 2-3 high-quality, on-brand images.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acquires the necessary visual assets for the blog post.
